Title: Cryogenic Tank Design Specification
Problem_Statement: Define complete design specification for AMPEL360 Q100 LH₂ storage tank meeting gravimetric efficiency, safety, and certification requirements
Scope_In: Tank sizing; Material selection; Structural design; Interface definition
Scope_Out: Manufacturing processes; Supply chain; Ground support equipment

Title: Tank Safety Case Development
Problem_Statement: Develop comprehensive safety case for LH₂ tank system demonstrating acceptable risk for catastrophic and hazardous failure conditions
Scope_In: Hazard identification; Risk assessment; Safety requirements; Mitigation strategies
Scope_Out: ATA-26 fire protection; ATA-71 power plant safety

Title: Insulation System Performance
Problem_Statement: Characterize and validate MLI insulation system performance under all flight and ground conditions to achieve <0.5%/day boil-off
Scope_In: MLI design; Thermal analysis; Performance testing; Degradation assessment

Title: Structural Qualification Plan
Problem_Statement: Define test matrix and acceptance criteria for structural qualification of cryogenic composite tank
Scope_In: Static test plan; Fatigue test plan; Damage tolerance; Test article requirements

Title: Certification Strategy
Problem_Statement: Define certification pathway including special conditions, means of compliance, and evidence requirements
Scope_In: Certification basis; MoC matrix; Special conditions proposal; Evidence planning
